house.description: A dwelling place for the people of TextCraft. Provides shelter and increases population cap.

market.description: A central hub for resource exchange, allowing players to trade gathered materials for advanced goods.

workshop.description: A versatile building that can produce basic tools and upgrade units

farm.description: Produces food resources, critical for maintaining population and unit growth.

granary.description: Stores surplus food and reduces waste, ensuring a steady supply during crises.

mills.description: Boost productivity of nearby farms, providing a small bonus to food

barracks.description: Trains infantry units and basic military personnel, providing the backbone for your army.

stables.description: Specializes in cavalry units for rapid response and hit-and-run tactics.

armory.description: Equips units with improved gear, increasing their combat effectiveness on the battlefield.

watchtower.description: Provides early warning of enemy advances and grants a defensive bonus to nearby units.

siege_workshop.description: Crafts siege engines, such as catapults and battering rams, for breaking enemy fortifications.

castle.description: Serves as the administrative and military command center, boosting overall unit morale.

palace.description: A grand symbol of power that enhances leadership and unlocks special units.

council_hall.description: A strategic venue for decision-making, unlocking diplomatic options and research benefits.

vault.description: Securely stores wealth and rare resources, protecting them from enemy raids.

mint.description: Generates wealth over time by producing coins for trade and strategic investments.

academy.description: Advances technology by unlocking new unit types, building upgrades, and special abilities.

magic_tower.description: Blends ancient arcane arts with modern strategy, offering mystical advantages in battle.

command_center.description: Integrates advanced strategy systems for real-time tactical adjustments and multi-unit coordination.
